meanings.definition: To choose or select in advance
meanings.sent1: The team captain is preelecting the players for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent2: She is preelecting the best candidate for the leadership role.
meanings.sent3: The robot started preelecting its favorite color for painting.
meanings.sent4: The wise owl seemed to be preelecting the perfect spot for its nest.
meanings.sent5: By preelecting the right ingredients, the chef ensured a delicious meal.

meanings.definition: The act of selecting or choosing beforehand
meanings.sent1: The preelecting of candidates for the student council was a thoughtful process.
meanings.sent2: His preelecting of the menu items made the event planning smoother.
meanings.sent3: The preelecting of costumes for the play added an element of surprise.
meanings.sent4: The preelecting of songs for the concert set the perfect mood.
meanings.sent5: Her preelecting of gifts for the party guests was appreciated by all.
